frameset.edef: to materialize, reach, or be realized

role.argrole: thing being realized reached or materialized

example.parse: (TOP (S (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P حققنا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الوعد)))) (CONJ و) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P انجزنا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC المشروع))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN اللجنة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الفرعية))))) (PUNC .)))

(TOP (S (CONJ و) (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تحقق) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الشرطة)) (PP-CLR (PREP في) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ما) (SUB_CONJ اذا) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM متدينون) (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM متطرفون)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC مسؤولين) (PP (PREP عن) (NP (PRON_3MS ه))))))))) (PUNC .)))

arg.g: whether religious extremists were responsible for it

example.arg: فيما إذا كان متدينون متطرفون مسؤولين عنه
